distinct
from change_code
order by ${orderByClause}

id,
package_name,

method_name,

change_type,

mapper.update:
update change_code
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
package_name = #{record.packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
javabean_name = #{record.javabeanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{record.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update change_code set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_name = #{record.packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, javabean_name = #{record.javabeanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{record.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_type = #{record.paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_type = #{record.changeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, method_body = #{record.methodBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, testing_or_not = #{record.testingOrNot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, production_task_number = #{record.productionTaskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update change_code
package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
javabean_name = #{javabeanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param_type = #{paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
method_body = #{methodBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
testing_or_not = #{testingOrNot,jdbcType=TINYINT},
production_task_number = #{productionTaskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update change_code set package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, javabean_name = #{javabeanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_type = #{paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, method_body = #{methodBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, testing_or_not = #{testingOrNot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, production_task_number = #{productionTaskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into change_code (production_task_number,package_name, javabean_name, method_name, param_type, change_type, method_body, testing_or_not) values
(#{item.productionTaskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.javabeanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.changeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.methodBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.testingOrNot,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: SELECT cc.id as id,te.id as package_name from change_code cc, method_chain_original mco, testing_example te where cc.production_task_number = #{productionTaskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (cc.testing_or_not = 0 or cc.testing_or_not is null) and change_type = 3 and cc.package_name = mco.package_name and cc.javabean_name = mco.javabean_name and cc.method_name = mco.method_name and cc.param_type = mco.param_type and mco.testing_example_id = te.id GROUP BY cc.id,te.id
